de.esoco.gwt.client.ui

Class DataElementPanelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.build.ContainerBuilder<C>
      • de.esoco.ewt.build.ContainerManager<C>
        • de.esoco.gwt.client.ui.PanelManager<de.esoco.ewt.component.Container,PanelManager<?,?>>
          • de.esoco.gwt.client.ui.DataElementPanelManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataElementInlinePanelManager, DataElementLayoutPanelManager, DataElementOrderedPanelManager, DataElementSwitchPanelManager, DataElementTablePanelManager

    public abstract class DataElementPanelManager
extends PanelManager<de.esoco.ewt.component.Container,PanelManager<?,?>>
    The base class for panel managers that display and handle data elements.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DataElementPanelManager.InteractiveInputHandler
      An interface to handle interactive input events for data elements.

    • Method Detail

      • containsSameElements

        public static boolean containsSameElements(java.util.List<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>> rList1,
                                           java.util.List<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>> rList2)
        Checks whether two lists of data elements contains the same data elements. The elements must be the same regargind their name and order.
        Parameters:
        rList1 - The first list of data elements to compare
        rList2 - The second list of data elements to compare
        Returns:
        TRUE if the argument lists differ at least in one data element

      • newInstance

        public static DataElementPanelManager newInstance(PanelManager<?,?> rParent,
                                                  de.esoco.data.element.DataElementList rDataElementList)
        Factory method that creates a new subclass instance based on the LayoutType of the data element list argument.
        Parameters:
        rParent - The parent panel manager
        rDataElementList - The list of data elements to be handled by the new panel manager
        Returns:
        A new data element panel manager instance

      • addElementEventListener

        public void addElementEventListener(de.esoco.ewt.event.EventType rEventType,
                                    de.esoco.ewt.event.EwtEventHandler rListener)
        Registers an event listener for events on all data element components that are displayed in this panel. The listener will be added by means of DataElementUI.addEventListener(EventType, EwtEventHandler).
        Parameters:
        rEventType - The event type the listener shall be registered for
        rListener - The event listener to be notified of events

      • addElementEventListener

        public void addElementEventListener(de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?> rDataElement,
                                    de.esoco.ewt.event.EventType rEventType,
                                    de.esoco.ewt.event.EwtEventHandler rListener)
        Registers an event listener for events of a certain data element component that is displayed in this panel. The listener will be added with DataElementUI.addEventListener(EventType, EwtEventHandler).
        Parameters:
        rDataElement - The data element to register the event listener for
        rEventType - The event type the listener shall be registered for
        rListener - The event listener to be notified of events

        Enables or disables interactions through this panel manager's user interface.
        Parameters:

      • findDataElement

        public de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?> findDataElement(java.lang.String sName)
        Searches for a data element with a certain name in this manager's hierarchy.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The matching data element or NULL if no such element exists

        Searches for the UI of a data element with a certain name in this manager's hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        sElementName - The name of the data element to search the UI for
        Returns:
        The matching data element UI or NULL if no such element exists

        Returns the dataElementList value.
        Returns:
        The dataElementList value

      • getDataElementUI

        public final DataElementUI<?> getDataElementUI(de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?> rDataElement)
        Returns the UI for a certain data element from the hierarchy of this instance. Implementations must search child panel manager too if they don't contain the data element themselves.
        Parameters:
        rDataElement - The data element to return the UI for
        Returns:
        The data element UI for the given element or NULL if not found

      • getRoot

        public DataElementPanelManager getRoot()
        Returns the root panel manager of this instance's hierarchy. If this instance is already the root of the hierarchy (i.e. it has no parent) it will be returned directly.
        Returns:
        The root panel manager

      • setElementVisibility

        public void setElementVisibility(DataElementUI<?> rElementUI,
                                 boolean bVisible)
        Sets the visibility of a data element. The default implementation does nothing but subclasses can override this method if the need to modify their state on visibility changes.
        Parameters:
        rElementUI - The UI of the data element
        bVisible - The visibility of the data element

      • setInteractiveInputHandler

        public final void setInteractiveInputHandler(DataElementPanelManager.InteractiveInputHandler rHandler)
        Sets the handler of interactive input events for data elements.
        Parameters:
        rHandler - The interactive input handler

      • update

        public void update(de.esoco.data.element.DataElementList rNewDataElementList,
                   boolean bUpdateUI)
        Updates this instance from a new data element list.
        Parameters:
        rNewDataElementList - The list containing the new data elements
        bUpdateUI - TRUE to also update the UI, FALSE to only update the data element references

      • updateFromChildChanges

        public void updateFromChildChanges()
        Updates this list from properties of updated child data elements. This will be invoked after all children have been update and therefore replaced in the hierarchy. Can be overridden by subclasses that need to react to child updates if no re-build has been performed.

      • updateUI

        public void updateUI()
        This method can be be overridden by subclasses to update the panel content from model data if it has changed. The default implementation invokes Component.repaint() on the manager's panel.

        Attention: Invoking this method will replace any values entered into input components with the model value stored in the data elements. Therefore it should only be invoked on display UIs or when the resetting of input fields is explicitly desired.

        Overrides:
        updateUI in class PanelManager<de.esoco.ewt.component.Container,PanelManager<?,?>>

      • createPanel

        protected abstract de.esoco.ewt.build.ContainerBuilder<?> createPanel(de.esoco.ewt.build.ContainerBuilder<?> rBuilder,
                                                                      de.esoco.ewt.style.StyleData rStyleData,
                                                                      de.esoco.lib.property.LayoutType eLayout)
        Must be implemented by subclasses to create the panel in which the data element user interfaces are placed.
        Parameters:
        rBuilder - The builder to create the panel with
        rStyleData - The style to create the panel with
        eLayout - The layout of the data element list
        Returns:
        A container builder instance for the new panel

        protected void checkSelectionDependency(DataElementPanelManager rRootManager,
                                        de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?> rDataElement)
        When a StateProperties.SELECTION_DEPENDENCY property exists in the given data element the corresponding event handling is initialized for all concerned data elements.
        Parameters:
        rRootManager - The root manager to search for dependent elements
        rDataElement - The data element to check for dependencies

      • getDataElementUIs

        protected final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DataElementUI<?>> getDataElementUIs()
        Returns the DataElementUI instances of this instance. The order in the returned map corresponds to the order in which the UIs are displayed.
        Returns:
        A ordered mapping from data element names to data element UIs

      • getLayout

        protected final de.esoco.lib.property.LayoutType getLayout()
        Returns the layout of this panel.
        Returns:
        The layout

      • handleInteractiveInput

        protected void handleInteractiveInput(de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?> rDataElement,
                                      de.esoco.lib.property.InteractionEventType eEventType)
        Handles the occurrence of an interactive input event for a data element that is a child of this manager. Will be invoked by the event handler of the child's data element UI.
        Parameters:
        rDataElement - The data element in which the event occurred
        eEventType - bActionEvent TRUE for an action event, FALSE for a continuous (selection) event

      • prepareChildDataElements

        protected java.util.Map<de.esoco.data.element.DataElement<?>,de.esoco.ewt.style.StyleData> prepareChildDataElements(de.esoco.data.element.DataElementList rDataElementList)
        Prepares the child data elements that need to be displayed in this instance.
        Parameters:
        rDataElementList - The list of child data elements
        Returns:
        A mapping from child data elements to the corresponding styles

      • setupEventHandling

        protected void setupEventHandling()
        Initializes the event handling for this instance.

        Updates the data element UIs of this instance.
        Parameters:
        bUpdateUI - TRUE to also update the UI, FALSE to only update the data element references

        Updates the style and selection from the data element list.
        Parameters:
        bStyleChanged - TRUE if the container style has changed
